short_description: SQL/MR function to train the model used in sentiment extraction.
long_description: SQL/MR function to train model used in sentiment extraction. At present, maximum extropy model is supported.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.rDescription: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the database where the input table is located.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database password of the user.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.rDescription: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.rDescription: The password for the SSL truststore.
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: InputTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table that contains the training data.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the table that contains the training data.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the training data.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the training data.

argument_clauses.name: SentimentColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the sentiment values, which are'POS' (positive), 'NEG' (negative), and 'NEU' (neutral).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the sentiment values, which are'POS' (positive), 'NEG' (negative), and 'NEU' (neutral).

argument_clauses.name: ModelFile
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the file to which the function outputs the model.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the file to which the function outputs the model.

argument_clauses.name: Language
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the language of the training data: 'en' (English), 'zh_CN' (Simple Chinese), 'zh_TW' (Traditional Chinese).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the language of the training data: 'en' (English), 'zh_CN' (Simple Chinese), 'zh_TW' (Traditional Chinese).
